solution_line_template: The oldest brother is {oldest_brother_age} because {third} x {younger_brother_age} = <<{third}*{younger_brother_age}={oldest_brother_age}>>{oldest_brother_age}
Michael is {michaels_age} because if 1 + (Michael's age - 1) x 2 = {oldest_brother_age} then Michael's age = {michaels_age}
